articles.author: Kasha Patel
articles.title: Scientists found Earth's sunniest spot, where it's like standing on Venus - The Washington Post
articles.description: The solar energy potential in the Altiplano is roughly, on average, twice as high than in Central Europe and the U.S. East Coast, the study author said.
articles.content:

Located near the western coast of South America is a large plain near the Andes Mountains, the Altiplano of the Atacama Desert. Standing at more than 4,000 meters high… [+6140 chars]
